meta.title: Alexander Morozov — Full-Stack Developer
meta.description: Building CRM systems, web applications, and payment integrations

hero.name: Alexander Morozov
hero.description: I build CRM systems, corporate websites, web and mobile applications. I modernize legacy projects and provide long-term support. I turn complex business processes into clean, working software.

crm.title: CRM Systems
crm.description: Booking systems, tracking and analytics. Interactive dashboards, third-party integrations

web.title: Web Applications
web.description: Corporate websites, dashboards, admin panels with React and Next.js

api.title: Backend & API
api.description: REST API, payment system integrations, microservices with NestJS

support.title: Support
support.description: Legacy project improvements, optimization, migration to modern stack

brief.title: Brief
brief.description: We discuss the task, define requirements, timeline, and budget. Create technical specifications.

design.title: Design
design.description: I develop the architecture, create interface prototypes, and align on design.

development.title: Development
development.description: Writing clean code, testing. Regular demos and feedback loops.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Deploy to server, set up monitoring. Training and documentation.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: Main stack: React/Next.js for frontend, NestJS/Express for backend, PostgreSQL for database. Also work with TypeScript, Redis, Docker, AWS. Technology choice depends on the task — I always select the optimal solution.

timeline.question: How long does development take?
timeline.answer: Landing page or small website — 1-2 weeks. Medium complexity CRM system — 2-3 months. Timeline depends on functionality scope and approval speed. Exact timeline discussed after reviewing requirements.

cost.question: How is pricing determined?
cost.answer: I estimate after reviewing requirements. Work on fixed price per project or hourly rate for long-term collaboration. 30-50% upfront, remainder upon completion. All terms documented in contract.

support.question: Is there support after launch?
support.answer: Yes, I provide 1-3 months warranty support after launch. Bug fixes are free. Also offer long-term support: improvements, updates, monitoring — under separate agreement.

communication.question: How does communication work?
communication.answer: We communicate via Telegram or email. Weekly calls for progress demos. Access to repository and task tracker. I respond during business hours within a few hours.

cavextable.title: Cavex CRM
cavextable.description: Workplace booking system for manufacturing with interactive map and comprehensive employee evaluation
highlights: Interactive SVG map with zoom and zone navigation
Multi-factor ratings with role-based weight coefficients
Three-month evaluation cycles with automatic notifications
Sliding window attendance calculation for periods
Employee rating and attendance dynamics charts

manipeni.title: Manipeni CRM
manipeni.description: Comprehensive CRM system for furniture manufacturing with automatic salary calculation, warehouse management, logistics and analytics
highlights: Legacy system modernization: Prisma ORM and express-zod-api for typed API
SQL triggers for automatic salary calculation
Task system with statuses and executor reassignment
Chats: private and group conversations with attachments and archiving
Web-push notifications via Service Worker and VAPID keys

crm2.title: Service CRM
crm2.description: Service request management system with scheduling and notifications
highlights: Request tracking from creation to completion
Staff scheduling calendar
Automated SMS and email notifications
Complete customer service history

theater.title: Theater Website
theater.description: Official website of the Udmurt Republic State National Theater with schedule, repertoire and ticket service integration
highlights: Complete legacy site redesign to modern stack
QuickTickets integration for online ticket purchase
Full data and media migration from old site
Custom Strapi lifecycle hooks for slug auto-generation
BVI plugin with lazy-loading for visually impaired visitors

payment.title: Payment System
payment.description: Payment gateway interface with transaction monitoring
highlights: Real-time transaction monitoring
Merchant dashboard with reports
REST API with documentation
Fraud detection system
